name: Easy Veggie Stir-Fry
description: Colorful, healthy stir-fry packed with vegetables
instructions: Prepare all vegetables by chopping into bite-sized pieces
Heat oil in wok over high heat until smoking
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds
Add harder vegetables first (carrots, broccoli), stir-fry 2 minutes
Add softer vegetables (peppers), stir-fry another 2 minutes
Pour in soy sauce and toss everything together
Serve over rice or noodles, sprinkle with sesame seeds
tips: Keep everything moving in the wok - don't let it burn
High heat is key for good stir-fry
Prep all ingredients before you start cooking
